releases.release: - Updated for Symphony 2.3; now requires Symphony 2.3.

- As of version 1.0.1 the extension now includes the "URL Segments as XML" datasource. You'll need to add this DS to your pages to be able to use it. 1.0.1 also includes a slight change to the behaviour when on the `index` page, if you're on the `index` page the extension will output the params as though it were on the fully resolved URL of that page - Requires: 2.0.6 to 2.2.5
